issue.title: Examine Java Dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1818](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1818). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While integrating the latest Arrow Java with Spark master, I noticed some possible binary incompatibilities with dependencies.  I'd like to examine these a little closer and make sure there are no problems before 0.8 is cut.


comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1818?focusedCommentId=16278897) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
After running the latest snapshot through Spark and checking dependencies, everything looks pretty good.  It does add netty artifacts that weren't there before, I believe they were not properly declared in Arrow in 0.4 and that was changed by this https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/978.  I think it should be fine for Spark as they could probably just be excluded since "netty-all" is already there.  cc `[~icexelloss]` `[~holdenk]`
